Question
========
Suppose four samples of different sizes are drawn from a population with $\mu$ = 100 and $\sigma$ = 30. Which of the following outcomes is least likely?


  
Answerlist
----------
* An average M $\geq$ 105 in a sample of n = 16.
* A mean M $\geq$ 105 in a sample of n = 9.
* A mean M $\geq$ 110 in a sample of n = 36.
* A mean M $\geq$ 110 in a sample of n = 25.
